element.default: Create a JavaScript variable called "str". Create a JavaScript function that takes a string input "str" and returns an encrypted version of the string using a custom encryption algorithm. This custom encryption algorithm based on arithmetic and bitwise operations. The function should not use any external libraries or dependencies and should produce a unique encrypted string for each input string. Please write the function using ECMAScript 5 syntax. Please write the function using var keyword instead of let and const. Once the function is generated, write this function invocation expression that calls this function with str variable. Without a sample string input to test its functionality.
element.label: Prompt
element.name: prompt
